name: Crux - Classic - Toro Marblehead
additionalNotes: The Crux Classic is a Nicaraguan puro designed to be enjoyed every day. And, it doesnâ€™t miss the mark. Expertly crafted by the famed Placencia Factory in Esteli, Nicaragua, the Classic features a Jalapa maduro wrapper with a binder and filler from Nicaragua for a medium-strength smoking experience. The Crux Classic offers up an interesting flavor profile that is best described as peppery and woodsy.
